  • int gzip (unsigned char *outBuffer, int outlen, const unsigned char *inBuffer, int inlen, int compressionLevel=-1)
    Tries to compress the inbuffer into the outbuffer.

Detailed Description

Utility class for GZip-function.

Should be portable and multiplatform so don't do anything without thinking about that.

Definition at line 22 of file GzipUtil.h.

Member Function Documentation

int GzipUtil::gzip (  unsigned char *  outBuffer,
int  outlen,
const unsigned char *  inBuffer,
int  inlen,
int  compressionLevel = -1
)  [static]
 

Tries to compress the inbuffer into the outbuffer.

If something goes wrong a negative number is returned otherwise the length of the compressed data.

Parameters:
outBuffer The output buffer.
outlen The available space in the output buffer.
inBuffer The buffer to read from.
inlen The available indata.
compressionLevel A number 0-9. See man gzip.
